# DiscontiguousAttributedSubstring

**Structure**

A discontiguous portion of an attributed string.

## Declaration

```swift
@dynamicMemberLookup struct DiscontiguousAttributedSubstring
```

## Instance Properties

- **base**: The underlying attributed string that the discontiguous attributed substring derives from.
- **characters**: The characters of the discontiguous attributed string, as a view into the underlying string.
- **runs**: The attributed runs of the discontiguous attributed string, as a view into the underlying string.
- **unicodeScalars**: The Unicode scalars of the discontiguous attributed string, as a view into the underlying string.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns an attribute value that corresponds to an attributed string key.
- **subscript(_:)**: Returns a discontiguous substring of this discontiguous attributed string using a range to indicate the discontiguous substring bounds.
- **subscript(_:)**: Returns a discontiguous substring of this discontiguous attributed string using a set of ranges to indicate the discontiguous substring bounds.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns an attribute value that a key path indicates.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns a scoped attribute container that a key path indicates.

## Conforms To

- AttributedStringAttributeMutation
- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
